character_profile: A top executive visits from the headquarters. Prepare for it and try super hard to impress him

day_1.activity: The team gathers for a meeting where it's announced that a top executive from headquarters will visit next week.
day_1.mood: Excited yet anxious about the upcoming visit.
day_1.rough_prompt: A group of employees in business casual attire, sitting around a table, looking attentive, while a manager stands at the front with a whiteboard displaying "Executive Visit Next Week!"

day_2.activity: Brainstorming session to come up with ideas on how to impress the executive.
day_2.mood: Collaborative and optimistic as everyone shares their input and ideas.
day_2.rough_prompt: A diverse group of employees around a large conference table, papers and laptops scattered, engaged in animated discussion with sticky notes on the wall.

day_3.activity: Employees tidying up and decorating the office to make it look its best.
day_3.mood: Energetic and motivated, with a sense of team spirit.
day_3.rough_prompt: Employees cheerfully cleaning and rearranging the office, hanging motivational posters, and placing fresh flowers on desks.

day_4.activity: Team members working on their presentations and materials for the visit.
day_4.mood: Focused and slightly stressed as deadlines approach.
day_4.rough_prompt: A close-up of an employee at their desk, surrounded by papers and a laptop, with a concentrated expression, glancing at a clock.

day_5.activity: Practicing presentations and role-playing for the executive's visit.
day_5.mood: Nervous but supportive as team members provide feedback and encouragement.
day_5.rough_prompt: An employee standing confidently in front of a projector screen while others sit attentively, taking notes and nodding.

day_6.activity: Last-minute preparations, ensuring everything is perfect for the visit.
day_6.mood: Anticipation mixed with excitement as the team makes final adjustments.
day_6.rough_prompt: Employees putting the finishing touches on a welcome banner, arranging chairs, and setting up refreshments in the break room.

day_7.location: The office entrance and meeting room
day_7.activity: Welcoming the executive and showcasing the team's work and achievements.
day_7.mood: Proud and slightly nervous, but confident in their preparations.
day_7.rough_prompt: The executive walking into the office, greeted warmly by smiling employees, with a beautifully arranged meeting area in the background.
